text: Virgin Islands competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Virgin Islands entered three swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Matthew Mays |align=left|200 m backstroke |2:07.03 |40 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m butterfly |2:03.47 NR |41 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Adriel Sanes |align=left|100 m breaststroke |1:02.91 |53 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m breaststroke |2:17.57 |44 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Natalia Kuipers |align=left|200 m freestyle |2:15.45 |52 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|400 m freestyle |4:41.69 |42 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Virgin Islands at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics Championships
title: Virgin Islands at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
